attributes.additional_details:
We want to save Astrop grange in Kings sutton,near Banbury.
There has already been petitions to stop this house from closing as it is a sheltered accommodation.
Grade 2 listed building that has had its grade taken away from it.
It is a grand house with oak stair case and is now left empty to deteriate.rumours circulating that this house is to be demolished.this is owned by south northants council.
The people of kings sutton and surrounding areas want to save this house.
